Are robots going to take all the jobs?

Posted by Dietrich Vollrath on January 19, 2009 · 3 mins read

A prominent concern is that automation, in the form of robots in particular, will destroy or take jobs from human beings. The materials here look at how likely or unlikely this is, how weâ€™ve responded to similar changes in automation in the past, and whether robots are fundamentally different in this regard.
